snippet.title: MicroWorks - Gameplay Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Challenge your friends with a hectic microgame frenzy in MicroWorks - face off against others in the Nexus, and compete in the various boss stages. You can also customize your own Kai using the in-game workshop! MicroWorks offers a ton of action and fun content to enjoy alone or with your friends.

• Wishlist MicroWorks on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1233410/MicroWorks/
• Follow the development on Twitter: https://twitter.com/agirikodigital
• Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/HMUDYn3
• Learn more about the game and get in touch with us: https://agiriko.digital/microworks/

Music: Flying Kites · Phototaxis

© 2021 Agiriko
